speaker: Tomb of Names
lines: You write your name with a steady hand.
The paint dries quickly on the stone.
You place the stone on the shelf and a draft moves through the room.
Somewhere a bell stops and the air settles.
A light touch rests on your shoulder and lifts.
You decide if the rite is finished.

choices.text: Say yes and step where the draft is going.
Say no and take your name back down.
